web.title: Web Design Form
questions: 2. What is the primary purpose of the website?/What are your key objectives?
3. Can you provide any reference websites that you like ? / What specifically do you like about these websites ?
4. What specific features would you like to include in your website?
5. Who is your target audience? / Can you describe a typical user who will visit your website?
6. What is your brand's style and aesthetic? Do you have existing branding or color schemes you want to incorporate?
7. Do you have any content ready for your website (text, images, videos)? If not, will you need assistance with content creation?
8. How often do you plan to update the content on your website?
9. Are there any specific technologies or platforms you'd prefer to use?
10. Do you have a deadline for the website completion? Is there a specific reason for this date?
11. What is your budget for this project (USD)?
